QuestData.Title: Hatchlings of the Talon
QuestData.Description:
Greetings, hatchling. Do you wish to soar amongst the clouds as my children do?
<Aviana chuckles - a clicking, crow-like noise.>
Very well, receive my blessing and we shall see how developed your wings are.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk to Aviana to receive her blessing, then complete her challenge by collecting Emerald Globes.
QuestData.RewardText: <You feel the warmth of Aviana's blessing once more. You have earned the ancient's respect.>
